summary: Completed SEO enhancement testing for iteration 146. All 13 backend API tests passed (100%). Frontend SEO working correctly on category and listing pages with proper meta tags, OG tags, and JSON-LD structured data. Social share buttons visible and functional. Location hierarchy properly included in meta descriptions.

sitemap_endpoint.GET /api/sitemap.xml: PASS - Returns valid XML sitemap with homepage (priority 1.0), static pages, listings, and proper structure
sitemap_endpoint.sitemap_validation: PASS - XML parses correctly with urlset namespace
sitemap_endpoint.listings_in_sitemap: PASS - Found multiple listing URLs in sitemap

listing_seo_endpoints.GET /api/seo-settings/listings/{id}/seo: PASS - Returns listing SEO data with title and seo_data fields
listing_seo_endpoints.POST /api/seo-settings/listings/{id}/reg: PASS - Admin can regenerate SEO data for individual listings
listing_seo_endpoints.POST /api/seo-settings/listings/bulk-reg: PASS - Admin can bulk regenerate SEO for listings without SEO data

robots_txt.GET /api/robots.txt: PASS - Returns valid robots.txt with User-agent and Sitemap reference

category_page_seo.title: Auto & Vehicles for Sale | Avida Marketplace
category_page_seo.meta_description: Browse 29+ auto & vehicles listings on Avida. Find great deals on auto & vehicles near you.

listing_page_seo.title: Tesla model 3 2026 | Avida Marketplace
listing_page_seo.meta_description: Tesla model 3 ahshjsjssnsbbshsh - Located in Dar es Salaam CBD, Ilala, Dar es Salaam
listing_page_seo.location_hierarchy: PASS - Full location shown: Dar es Salaam CBD, Ilala, Dar es Salaam

critical_code_review_comments: SEO generator in /app/backend/utils/seo_generator.py correctly handles location hierarchy with city_name, district_name, region_name, country_name
Sitemap endpoint at /api/sitemap.xml properly includes homepage, static pages, categories, subcategories, listings, and business profiles
ListingSEO component correctly uses locationData prop to build enhanced meta descriptions with full location
SocialShareButtons component correctly uses Platform.OS check for web/native handling
seed_data_creation: No seed data created - used existing listing a43909ba-6022-430f-8170-b1af696d89da
